front.title: Definitions of managed objects for the DS1 Interface type

author.organization: Performance Systems International, Inc., Reston International Center

abstract.t: This memo defines an experimental portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in TCP/IP-based internets. In particular, this memo defines MIB objects for representing DS1 physical interfaces. Implementors should consult in addition to this memo the companion document that describes that DS3 managed objects.
